message.content:
I need to identify and extract the value of cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statements.

Looking at the cash flow statement section, I can see a line item specifically for this:

```
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 20000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |
```

This clearly shows that the beginning balance of cash and cash equivalents was 20,000,000.00.

I can verify this by looking at the balance sheet, where the initial amounts for cash accounts are:
- Cash on Hand: 5,000,000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Bank Deposits: 15,000,000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Total: 20,000,000.00

This confirms that the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period was 20,000,000.00.

{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'}}
